parameters.query: INSERT INTO aeo_optimization (product_id, primary_entity, related_entities, entity_keywords, json_ld_product, json_ld_faq, aeo_score, last_analyzed_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, NOW()) ON CONFLICT (product_id) DO UPDATE SET primary_entity = $2, related_entities = $3, entity_keywords = $4, json_ld_product = $5, json_ld_faq = $6, aeo_score = $7, last_analyzed_at = NOW() RETURNING id
